fields.label: Text to display on submit
fields.default: អ្នកបានបំពេញកម្រងសំណួររួចហើយ។

fields.label: Required message exit button label
fields.default: បិទសារកំហុស

fields.label: Progress bar text
fields.default: សំណួរទី %current ចំណោម %max
fields.description: Used to tell assistive technologies what question it is. Variables: [ %current, %max ]

fields.label: Required message
fields.default: សំណួរនេះទាមទារចម្លើយ
fields.description: Will display if this field is unanswered and required by a wrapper content type

fields.label: Required symbol text
fields.description: Text that will accompany an asterisk to signal that a question is required

fields.label: Title for the submit screen
fields.default: អ្នកបានឆ្លើយសំនួរទាំងអស់ដោយជោគជ័យ

fields.label: Subtitle for the submit screen
fields.default: ចុចខាងក្រោមដើម្បីប្រគល់ចម្លើយរបស់អ្នក
